name: akkoma
description: Akkoma is a lightweight fork of the Pleroma social networking server, built on ActivityPub for federated microblogging. It offers lower resource usage, customization, federation, and is ideal for self-hosting private or public social communities.
features: Federated Social: Connect with the fediverse through ActivityPub protocol. Join a decentralized network.
Lightweight: Lower resource usage than alternatives, runs on modest hardware. Efficient and fast.
Highly Customizable: Extensive configuration options for your community's needs. Make it yours.
Privacy-Focused: Self-host for complete control over your social data. No corporate surveillance.
Rich Media: Support for images, videos, polls, and custom emoji. Express yourself fully.
Moderation Tools: Powerful tools to manage your community effectively. Keep your space safe.
Mobile Compatible: Works seamlessly with various mobile apps and clients. Post from anywhere.
Active Development: Regular updates and improvements from dedicated community. Constantly evolving.
